content:
[test]You're still wearing the outfit you had on when I first met you.
Why don't you try picking out some new clothes?
Glenn has some in stock.
info: 闲聊-玩家穿着基础服装的闲聊-0保底_单一闲聊

content:
[test]It's incredible how just a new outfit
can almost feel like a breath of fresh air.
It's mysterious~
info: 闲聊-玩家穿着基础服装的闲聊-0保底_单一闲聊
